references.reference: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure:CR S2174-2175

actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit for the installation of sprinklers and elevators in historic structures.
short_title: Historic Downtown Preservation and Access Act

summary.text:
Historic Downtown Preservation and Access Act 

 Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable tax credit for 50% of the cost of installing an elevator system or a sprinkler system in a certified historic structure. Limits the total amount of such credit to $50,000 in any taxable year.

titles.title: Historic Downtown Preservation and Access Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit for the installation of sprinklers and elevators in historic structures.
Historic Downtown Preservation and Access Act
